channel.title: Yankees on Underdog Advantage
channel.description: Recent content in Yankees on Underdog Advantage

item.title: How much is Aaron Judge worth? (And is he still underpaid?)
item.description: Aaron Judge is coming off of his record breaking 62 home-run season. After breaking the AL record for most home runs in a season, Judge signed a nine-year, $360 million extension to stay in pinstripes. So what gives? Are the Yankees paying the right price for a burgeoning super-star? Or are these mega-deals a less-efficient use of money? How good is Aaron Judge? It feels like a dumb question to ask, but nonetheless it is worth asking.
